features: 🚗【Toddler Toys Set】---LASCOTON 5-in-1 cartoon trailer truck cars set includes a large trailer and 3 different colorful cars & 1 airplane, which can helps children identify colors. The upgraded version of the rich color matching/cute cartoon expression/unique body printing brings more fun to the transport truck toy set.It's the best 1 2 3 year old girl gifts birthday or other festivals.

🚙【Inertial Double Layer Carrier Truck】--- Just push the big trailer truck forward and get auto driving. It will carry four mini vehicles and set off ! pull back the mini vehicles for a certain distance and let go, the car will automatically move forward and gradually accelerate. You can change direction or separate the truck cab from the trailer through the movable towing assembly. The tailgate can be locked for driving or lowered for unloading mini-vehicle.

🚕【Flashing Lights & Real Whistle】---Press the button on the top of the car head, you can see the car lights flashing, accompanied by cheerful music. Press the button once, the music will only last for 8 seconds, no need to worry about being too noisy.LASCOTON toddler toys attracting children's attention, making the trailer toy more realistic, please note that 2 AA batteries are required (not Included in the package).

🚌【High-quality Girl Toys】---Safe & Perfect toys for 1 2 year old girl. The scientific size design of the car toy is very suitable for children's small hands, make children to enjoy more fun. At the same time, the overall toy uses high-quality and durable ABS soft plastic , smooth contour and no burrs, won't harm baby's delicate skin. Comply with U.S. toy safety standards.

🚑【Best Enlightenment Gift】---The toy cars set can exercise the children's initiative & imagination. Parents can play with kids, help them to learn traffic knowledge , grow up happily in the process of playing. A good choice for toddler toys age 2-4, excellent gifts 1 2 year old toys for girls in birthday, Children's day, Christmas, Chanukah, Easter, STEM and any occasion,festival.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LASCOTON Upgraded Version Cars Toy Set --- 5-in-1 Carrier Truck Vehicles Toys for 1 2 3 Years Old Girls This cartoon vehicle toy will make the kids to become a little driver,learn about various daily transport car while playing.Parents can accompany their children to play together and tell them the traffic rules,which can exercise their eye-hand coordination and help them master daily common sense earlier.
Safe & High Quality Material Made of non-toxic BPA-free plastic. Pass the US toy CPSIA and ASTM test. smooth contour and no burrs, won't harm kids' delicate skin.Child-friendly.

Detachable Cab After reaching the destination, you can separate the front and rear parts of the truck, simulate real towing jobs, making the overall toy more interesting. Multi- Function Toys Car There is a retractable tailboard at the rear of the trailer. When closed, the tailboard is locked to fix the mini car. When opened, tailboard turn into a ramp which can unload the vehicles, simulating a real trailer combination. Smooth Turn The trailer cab and the traction compartment are connected with movable joints which make the truck steer smooth

Soft Rubber Tires The tires of the mini cars are made of soft rubber, which is odorless and non-toxic, with deep lines on the surface and strong grip. Pull Back and Go! Pull-back car design, the size is suitable for children's small hands, pull back and then let go, the car will automatically move forward at a high speed! More Cars, More fun Multi-colored mini cars, help children improve color recognition,give your child a gift that creates endless happy moments!

Funny Bonus! The trailer, 3 cars, and airplane all have corresponding identification cards, which introduce their names and basic information. Our toddlers puzzle are made from durable and safe thicken multi-layer paperboard. They are long-lasting and have beautiful cars prints. Simulation version of construction trailer toy, and the toys Package with beautifully designed gift boxes. A highly recommended birthday present, gift ideas for kids, home decoration, travel toys, party favors, festival gifts, Christmas gifts toys for 1 2 3 year old Girl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My niece is 11 months and loved to play with her brothers cars but his were too little so I got her these and she lives to play with her cars. It’s super cute to watch. She even throws them and they don’t break, which is awesome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute, and Fun
reviews.reviewText: Gifted to my 1 1/2 year old niece. She loves it. All the cars wind up and make noises. It is not that annoying, but is easy to figure out how they work. Colorful, well made, and fun toy for any kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The little vehicles are adorable. Everything seems to be holding up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for small kids
reviews.reviewText: It's a decent product for the price. There is a pinch point on the bed of the truck, so be cautious of the top of the bed of the truck. The toys are easy for a 1 or old to use, and fun enough for kids of all ages to enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little loud
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and I love everything about this toy. It’s really great quality!. I’ll give it 4 stars because the only one thing I don’t like about it is the music in my opinion is extra loud so it’s kinda annoying. I wish it talked instead of Music, that would have been a lot more cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my 18 month old and she loves it. Batteries not included, but the truck plays a couple of tunes and lights up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable Fun and Creative
reviews.reviewText: My daughter absolutely loves trucks so for christmas we bought her this and she went crazy.It plays music by pushing the top of the truck and the lights start flashing.The colors are exactly as shown.Very cute collection.Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Present Idea!
reviews.reviewText: These toys were great! My 14 month old loves them! Each car worked great and Zoom all around for my toddler to chase!
